power.title: Deep Freeze
power.fluff: Driving your weapon home, you hiss a word of power, and white bone-chilling mist begins to seep from your foe's body

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, each time an enemy enters a space adjacent to the target or starts its turn adjacent to it, that enemy takes cold damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. A creature can only take this damage once per turn.

At the start of the target's turn, if no enemy has taken this cold damage since the end of the target's previous turn, the target takes cold damage equal to 4 + your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus and can attempt a saving throw to end the effect at the end of that turn.

power.title: Dimensional Bond
power.fluff: Your thrust connects you with your foe and creates a dimensional bond that allows you to teleport to its location

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, the target is dimensionally bonded to you. You can use the Bonded Step action at-will:

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport up to 10 squares. You must end this movement adjacent to your dimensionally bonded creature, or as close to it as possible.

power.title: Elemental Foible
power.fluff: You weave a deadly symbol in your foe's flesh, leaving its body fragile to the elements

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.
The target gains vulnerable 5 to the chosen damage type until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Energy Theft
power.fluff: You draw on your enemy's natural resilience to protect your allies from harm

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

If the target has a resistance to the chosen damage type, the resistance is lowered by up to 10 until the end of the encounter. If the target does not have a resistance, it instead gains vulnerable 5 to the chosen damage type (save ends).
You and allies within 5 squares of you gain resist 5 to the chosen damage type while the target is affected by this power.

power.title: Enervating Slash
power.fluff: Your weapon turns pitch blas as you strike, and the wound it leaves behind drains your enemy of strength when it attacks your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is subject to a protective drain (save ends).
While protectively drained, the target's attacks deal half damage to your allies. This counts as the weakened condition.

power.title: Lingering Lightning
power.fluff: Tendrils of bluish white lightning course from your weapon to electrocute your enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends), or 4d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damaga and ongoing 10 lightning damage if you only target one creature.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
If you only targeted one creature, it also takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).

power.title: Mark of the Hound
power.fluff: With a wicked flourish, you carve your mark into the flesh of your foe, enabling you to find the creature wherever it goes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits against the target:
You gain a +5 power bones on Perception checks and passive Perception against the target.

You automatically know the target's location while it is within 20 squares of you, even if line of sight or line of effect would normally be blocked. You still take any penalties from concealment or cover as normal.
The target counts as being flanked for you when you and at least one ally are adjacent to the target.

power.title: Shielding Fire
power.fluff: A gout of flame springs from your weapon, searing your enemy and threatening to consume it in deadlier flames

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is marked by you until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Arcane Aegis:
section.text: The target counts as being marked by your arcane aegis class power, though this does not end an existing mark created by that power and using the power does not end this mark.
You gain a benefit depending on which of the following subfeature you chose:

section.name: Aegis of Assault:
section.text: If you miss the target with the attack made as part of your aegis of assault class power, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. If your attack has a damage type, this is of the same type or types.
Also, if your attack does not have a damage type or keyword, you can choose to make the damage fire and give the attack the Fire keyword.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: When you use your aegis of ensnarement class power against the target, the first attack you make against the target before the end of your next turn deals fire damage in addition to any other damage, and gains the Fire keyword. The fire damage equals your 2 + Constitution modifier.

section.name: Aegis of Shielding:
section.text: Your aegis of shielding power gains the Fire keyword when used against the target. After the triggering attack has been resolved, the triggering enemy takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Spreading Flame
power.fluff: Your attack inflicts a grievous wound and unleashes a gout of flame that consumes your enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Arcane Aegis:
section.text: If the target is marked by your arcane aegis class power and on its turn it makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes a -5 penalty to its next saving throw against this ongoing damage.
Each time the target takes this fire damage, each enemy adjacent to the target also takes 5 fire damage.
